storyInfo: After the two sides test each other multiple times, the mysterious man introduces himself. They are apparently the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps. In the underground passage, Corps Captain Feist explains to Amiya and the Rhodes Islanders the current situation in Londinium.

attributes.content: Pipes. They are buried deep underground with no end in sight.
These pipes connect the entire city. They are the veins of Londinium. It is through them that the energy is supplied to Londinium's heart, and that is where we are right now.
Never fear the darkness before your eyes. When the sun sets at night, the shadows live on in the city's veins.
When the light is taken, you trust your ears, your nose, and your remaining senses.
Listen carefully. The mechanical rumble is the flow of its blood. The gears rotate rhythmically like breathing.
Indeed, Londinium is alive. Even if we do not sit on its tall throne, it lives on as its own organism.
If you ever find yourself here again one day... no matter what may be chasing you, you needn't be afraid.
After all, you run through the body of Londinium.
Vina, you are home.
Okay, everyone. We can stop here for a while.
Uh, where exactly are we?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We've been climbing down all this time... It's like we burrowed ourselves into some kind of pipeline...
attributes.name: Closure
Closure
attributes.content: The walkway's broader, but it's still sark as hell...

attributes.name: Closure
attributes.content: Waaahhh... Are you those cutthroats who would drive us to some abondoned construction site and slice our neck?
Huh...? *Cough*, you might be right about that.
Who the hell are you anyway, punk? Don't think we'll just follow your every word.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hm... to be on the safe side, let me ask you the same question.
Who are you people? Why are you trying to sneak into Londinium?
Before we answer that, you need to let our employee go.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Right, you're taking me hostage.;......;Let go already.

attributes.content: Is our hooded friend your commander?
Sure enough. I figured out who calls the shots in battle. That said, Cautus lady, you're the one who's actually in charge, right?
Don't be so surprised. I'll admit you have a few tricks up your sleeves, but... we're locals, and we know this playbook a lot better than you.
A local... You live in Londinium, then?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Were you part of that big fight earlier?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Stop with the guesses. We haven’t worked up the mutual trust yet.
Dublinn and the Sarkaz fighting each other doesn't prove anything. Them bickering doesn't mean we should fall down on either side.
Londinium's veins.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wh-What did you say?
We've made it inside Londinium.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: How can you tell?!
These pathways connect the city to the outside. They can get us past the Sarkaz guards and inside the city.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: How long have we walked? Twenty minutes?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I reckon we're right underneath a certain key facility in Sudean right now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Uh...
The facility isn't far from the walls. And it is a key hub. From here, you can get to many places in the city.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Rail tracks...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Just another kilometer or two ahead, and there will be a train station above us.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You know Londinium well. I suppose you used to live here?
I'm a local, too.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No wonder. I was about to say your hammer feels especially familiar. Feline lady... Uh, you're a Feline, right?
Whatever you are, that's what I am.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: *Sigh*. I’m really gonna regret this if you guys are actually Sarkaz spies, aren’t I?
Don't hurt the Doctor—!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: He can't hurt me.;It's too late to regret anything.

attributes.content: Huh?! W-When did you take over the drone?
Y-You're holding it in your bare hands?! I could detonate the drone bomb right now, you know?!

attributes.options: You don't have a remote.;This drone isn't even finished. All it can do is fly.

attributes.content: Urgh, this is bad.
When did you figure it out? When I was talking to you? Or when I led you down the underground passage?
Maybe even before that...? Hold on. You didn't... you couldn’t have figured out all the way back when I captured you? That this drone poses no threat?
And you let me drag you all the way down here?!

attributes.options: I had to get a feel of your intentions.;You think my friends here didn't know?

attributes.content: If I had thought for a second you were going to hurt the Doctor, my hammer would've cracked your skull before your hand could even touch the remote.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You know, you really should've picked someone dumber for your hostage, like this punk who only knows to speak with her fists. She might have fallen for your trick.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You think he could come anywhere close?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Uh... so the signal jammer I brought along isn't gonna come in handy?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: —Mr. 'Local.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I think it's about time we put an end to this charade. No more testing each other.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We may not face enemy cannon fire, but there's still a threat to the both of us out there.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haven't we proven ourselves?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've had many opportunities to take you down from the moment we met. Suppose we were actually spies sent here by the Sarkaz. We've already figured out the size of things here, so why waste any more time talking to you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The only reason that the Doctor was playing the hostage here and that we willingly followed you into this passageway is because we believe you mean no harm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So shouldn't you put your trust in us more and tell us what your goal is?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm, that sounds very convincing. I mean, you could say I'm your hostage now.
Rockrock, come on out.
D-D-Dr-Drones...? So many?! With that formation, they're aiming at us, aren't they? T-They could shoot us all full of holes!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Rockrock, stop it.
It doesn't matter if they spot you or your drones. Considering their strength, I wouldn't be able to get out alive, if we came to blows.
If you knew that, maybe you shouldn't have brought me along to play your stupid games.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Fine, you're right.
Hey, hooded friend, can you give Rock-17 back? The drone in your hand there. It's only half-done. If you break it, Rockrock is going to be livid.
Phew... Well, pleased to make your acquaintance.
I'm Feist. This is Rockrock, my partner.
We belong to the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: How many places do you think there are in Londinium that our eyes cannot reach?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Countless many.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: There are thousands of old factories in the city. Roughly four-in-ten are abandoned. The remaining sixty percent are still operational.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Most of the factories that are still running are built on the sites of even older factories. The factory buildings might as well be labyrinths filled with centuries' worth of industrial waste.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: As many factories as there are, there are even more slums hidden away between the factory buildings. Not even the top echelons of the city's defense force can say how many there are living in these civilian industrial and old logistics districts.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Sometimes, I even think this place isn't so different from Kazdel.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The more colorful outer shell is the main difference. That, and they buried the rotten parts deeper inside to keep the stench from suffocating the distinguished elite.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Trying to fish a group of troublemakers out of the Kazdel slums in three days is like trying to rob a group of Lateran envoys covered by the Apostolic Knights on your own. Not an easy ask.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: It is still built atop the foundation that we were all born in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Londinium... Who dares to claim to know Londinium so well?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: How long did it take us to defeat the parliamentary guard and take command of seventy percent of the city's defense forces?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Less than a week.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: How long did it take us to hang the aristocrats that took the lead in the opposition and defeat the hooligans they spent great sums to hire dozens of times, until they all finally fell in line?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: A month and a half.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Yet we are now months into our tug-of-war with the so-called rebels here in the Sudean streets and alleys.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: In just half a year, we seized nearly every borough of Londinium.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Every borough except this one.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: A half-abandoned industrial district. From the south all the way to the north, it surrounds the mountains in Londinium's center and connects to the rarely-visited old logistics districts.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: 'This is where the history of Londinium begins.'
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So the history books claim.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I know that there must be at least one king, perhaps even several, who are dissatisfied with my progress.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You mentioned that they wanted to completely seal off this ward.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: They are far too easily offended. As soon as command here falls into their hands, they will build a new wall between Sudean and the other wards with the bodies of the Londiniers.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: At the very least, the Regent supports you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: No, it is I who must do everything I can to support the general.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The court does not understand the general's pain... They do not understand how fragile the current balance is.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Do you know why I insisted on activating only the secondary defense cannons?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: If I activate the primary cannons right now... will the dukes out there march right inside?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Suppose we proceed to slaughter all the people of Londinium. Will that once again stir disloyalty among the nobles in the city and the soldiers who joined us, causing them to turn their swords against us and fight to the bitter end?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Suppose we completely abandon this industrial district. How much longer will the general's plans be delayed without the trains carrying materials to The Shard every day?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The lords' pride prevented them from casting their ancient skulls downward to see these foreign cities.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: In my opinion, if we are to control all of Londinium, the most difficult battle we must fight is right before our eyes.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The Sarkaz calls us the rebels. We got no complaints in that department.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: If the only way to save ourselves is by standing up against them, then even the most ordinary of Londiniers will take up arms.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Do you know what's happening in the other wards?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Can't be better than here.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: All of us either work for the Sarkaz or die.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We've been getting bits and pieces of news from up north. From what I heard, the Sarkaz army there's much more cruel.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Vina, does that mean Baird and the rest who stayed behind...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Calm down.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: How am I supposed to be calm?! It's been five years! Five years! I don't even know if they're still...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: We'll find them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Soon, we'll find each of them, one by one.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Okay, Vina. I trust you. No matter where they are. No matter if they're alive or...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Never mind! I won't get so gloomy in front of everyone.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Ladies, as long as your friends are still alive, we should have a way to get in touch with them.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You operate outside of Sudean too?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We can get anywhere in Londinium. Even outside the city.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: For each of us they take away, ten more join our ranks.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rockrock is a born and bred Sudean girl. She's one of our most senior fighters. She knows better than the rest of us how our team grew, bit by bit.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Seeing as you're leading a team now, we might've been adding to our ranks a little too quickly.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Haha, who do you think led you to eleven victories, Lieutenant?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: All we did was lead people underground. How does that count as a victory?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Managing to live another day under the Sarkaz's noses, all while we get to keep operating in the dark? I'd call that a win.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It's just as you saw. The Sarkaz haven't taken complete control of Sudean yet.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The terrain and flow of people here are so chaotic that if the Sarkaz really are trying to take control of every inch, then they must really have underestimated the place.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: And besides... This is where the last Londinium defense force squad fought the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Looks like they lost too.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: *Sigh*... They fought and they lost.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That battle was over quick... way too quick. Before any of us could react, the Sarkaz were already standing atop the walls.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It's all because of the traitors! They bought out our elite squads!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Miss, were you in the military?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No, I wasn't. I was... uh... a local, like them.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Alright, a local.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I know the military had its share of traitors. Plenty of them, even.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The traitors and some of the aristocrats defected to the Sarkaz with much of the defense force.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Outside Sudean, you may still find Londinium forces patrolling the streets, but their commanding officers are all regulars at Sarkaz soirees now.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What about the last squad that fought here?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: They held out to the bitter end. Each of them paid a dear, terrible price.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I don't know how many of them survived, but I think... having experienced a hopeless fight like that, even if they made it out alive, their hearts must ache whenever they look at Londinium's walls.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Don't be so alarmed. Keep your head up. Take your hand off the crossbow, and relax a little.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough*.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: The residents here are used to seeing all kinds of people. They won't help us, but as long as they don't feel their lives are in danger, they won't follow Dublinn or the Sarkaz's orders.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Life under the enemy's watchful eyes... I can't imagine going through that.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Do you know how they used to think of us?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Uh, I haven't thought about it.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I never did either.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant...?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Alright, stop calling me Lieutenant. I'm Horn here. There are way too many lieutenants running around, of all different factions.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Right, Horn. Where are we going?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: To regroup with my companions first.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The Sarkaz patrol will pass by the area in five minutes. We'll split into two teams and follow the rail tracks east separately.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: After three hundred and fifty meters, you'll see an iron staircase leading up.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If you hear five metallic knocks, come on up. Three, stay put. Two, disband immediately.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You might think the abandoned factories there look familiar... Don't be surprised. It's Dublinn's stronghold.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Isn't that a little dangerous?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: With Dublinn occupying the area, the Sarkaz don't go there often.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Want to try your hand at hide-and-seek? You're welcome to join in on the fun.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: So are you really just a normal business?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: Just like you're a normal engineer.

attributes.content: Haha... That's putting it simply.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Now that the Sarkaz are in charge of Londinium, who am I to doubt your excuses? You're security personnel working for a medical corporation, right?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Let's see... a team with a total of seventeen people. All of you are outfitted with military-grade equipment, and you work well with each other. You even have these half-decent drones.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: 'Half-decent...?'
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What do you mean, 'half-decent?' You can't talk about my work like that!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ehhh, settle down.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I didn't get a good look at them up there. Maybe you can show them to me another time?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The Sarkaz blew them all up! Just thinking about it makes my heart ache!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Why don't you try fixing them? You should have a couple wrecked drones left, right? How about I take a look at them for you? I have all the tools we need.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Closure, I did manage to snatch two...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.options: Those drones are Rhodes Island technology.;You have to work with us first before we can share it.

attributes.content: I gotta find something nice to trade with you, then?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Whoa, someone's cautious.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Doctor... What kind of doctor are you anyway? Eh, never mind. We'll talk about it another time. I'm in no rush.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That aside, how did you make it to Londinium in the first place? I've told you plenty about the city's situation. If we're working with each other, why don't you tell me something about the outside?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It was a long journey...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know you already fought Dublinn.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You have eyes outside the city?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Cautus lady. We talked about this. We're sharing information with each other.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Taking us back a bit... We did have a run-in with Dublinn outside Londinium...
attributes.name: Amiya
